channel.title: 譚慎格 on 王景弘 - 資深新聞工作者
channel.description: Recent content in 譚慎格 on 王景弘 - 資深新聞工作者

item.title: 敬悼班立德（Mark Pratt）先生
item.description: 譚慎格譯 Among the American diplomats who were once stationed in Taipei, there were two who had the closest relationships with the “non-Party figures” and Taiwan’s democratic movement: Ralph Clough and Mark Pratt.
